attributes.additional_details:
We would like all UK MPs or MEPs from April 2015 to have no position of interest financial or occupational external to their post as a politician, this for the duration of their term in office at UK or EU parliament.

Why is this important?

The importance is that it would rule out conflict of interest for MPs and MEPs and make sure that all MPs and MEPs are fully serving the greater good of the UK Population.

How it will be delivered

We will deliver this to the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority and Cabinet Office by March 2015.
